bug.author: rushtehrani
bug.summary: CVAT node pool and GCS S3 support fixes
bug.description: Node pools are pulling the default node pool value instead of API values GCS S3 interoperability mode is not working when pushing data to training workflow Update CVAT template and corresponding migration
